div.pre: 1918 S. Demetrio Corone, 25 km. SW of Sybaris, Lucania, 1955? Burial: c. 350 B.C. (K) Contents: 15 AR Taras: 3 st. (to Per. III) Metapontum: 5 st. (to Noe 467) Poseidonia: 2 st. (early double-relief) Thurium: 3 st. (including HP and Molossus) Croton: 2 st. (Apollo/Heracles and snakes) Disposition: Reggio Procopio, AIIN 1956, p. 221 Details noted by K at Reggio
